sndlib.core.util
Class DateFormat

java.lang.Object
  sndlib.core.util.DateFormat

public class DateFormat
extends java.lang.Object

This class encapsulates the common date format of SNDlib.

Author:
Roman Klaehne

Method Summary

          Returns the common string representation of the given date.

getFormatString

public static java.lang.String getFormatString()
Returns the format pattern of the common date format.

Returns:
the date format pattern

format

public static java.lang.String format(java.util.Date date)
Returns the common string representation of the given date.

Parameters:
date - the date to format
Returns:

parse

public static java.util.Date parse(java.lang.String dateString)
                            throws java.text.ParseException
Parses the given date string into a date by applying the common date format.

If the given string encodes a 2-digit-year it is placed in the range [1950, 2049].

Parameters:
dateString - the date string to parse into a date
Returns:
the parsed date
Throws:
java.text.ParseException - if the given string cannot be parsed into a date
